activities:
Telescope’s proprietary technology platform, Connect Live, is a cloud-based platform that enables the creation and management of cross channel interactive campaigns for clients in TV, sports, live events, news and brands.  The platform enables clients to power social marketing campaigns and real-time interactive experiences to develop audience, fan  and consumer engagement through a suite of digital  products.
 
The platform is built to deliver self service solutions or fully supported custom solutions.
 
Our Connect Live platform aggregates and filters data originating from Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Vine, SMS, email and through direct upload functionality into a single, easy to manage, user interface.  It also offers all the necessary tools to power successful UGC campaigns e.g. vote and sweepstakes campaigns. Our solutions are fully optimized for an screen or platform such as TV, websites, mobile websites, Facebook Canvas, & native apps for both tablets & mobile devices.
 
Telescope may collect anonymized information, including application usage and browsing sessions. At times Telescope may collect personally identifiable information through sweepstakes or other interactive campaigns where users submit their personal or social network data which may include first and last name, address, email address, and phone number.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
